cause.description:
In the year 2000, 189 countries of the world agreed on the Millennium Development Goals. That includes Australia.
We hae also pledged, for many years, to give 0.7% of our GNI in foreign aid, or Official Development Assistance.
So we ask the Australian government to live up to their promise. Face Up To Poverty with Make Poverty History.
Go to www.makepovertyhistory.com.au/faceup to face up to poverty now!
1. Show your support for Make Poverty History by adding your face to Australia's largest ever 'face petition.'
cause.mission: Say yes and Face Up To Poverty.
cause.name: Face Up To Poverty
